:ref:`methods <methods_2>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The solution methods object.

:ref:`report_definitions <report_definitions>`                                                                                                                      Provides access to create an object that specifies a certain quantity or set of values to be computed at the end of a solver timestep or iteration. You can then choose to have multiple report definitions printed to the console written to a single file or plotted in the same window.

:ref:`monitor <monitor>`                                 Provides access to common settings to monitor the convergence dynamically during the solution process by checking residuals, statistics, force values, surface integrals, and volume integrals. You can print reports of or display plots of lift, drag and moment coefficients, surface integrations and residuals for the solution variables. For unsteady flows you can also monitor elapsed time.
